评论概述: I Lovely skirt , soft, may need extra care.
评论详情: It arrived wrapped really nicely in pretty paper inside a pretty box.  Check the sizing chart. One size does not actually fit all. The fabric is soft and thin but I do not believe it is thin enough to see through.  The rope like threading separating the squares has a lot of loose threads The colors are not going to be what you see in the listing pictures but it’s still very nice looking.  Mine is tight for me but i like the skirt so much I was going to keep it and just fix the loose threads as I find them ( tuck them in or sew them into place) but then I found that 4 of the 5 elephant print squares were damaged . There is a frayed line across them that I know will end up as tears.  Giving the skirt 4 stars because it’s really nice on the eyes and to the touch but may require extra maintenance to keep it from turning into a thready mess.

The picture shows a skirt with small patches that are all bordered. I got a skirt with big patches that are only bordered on the top and bottom. The skirt in the picture is a cute hippie skirt. The one I got is more like Holly Hobby. Not the look I'm going for. Returning immediately!

I returned this item. I expected it to be dusty green and there may  have been a few pieces of patchwork dusty green on the skirt, it was contained bright pink and bright turquoise blue and other colors and not much dusty green. I thought it would be all dusty green as pictured above and not include other colors. Also, the sewing on it was mediocre and the fit was a but snug for me. In addition, there was an odor to the garment.

i got the green and it looks just like the picture! I’m 5’10 and around 150lbs the skirt fits great! I was worried it wouldn’t be long enough, it hits at around the ankles so it’s definitely a maxi : ) , I love the look of it, I’m going to order in another color too! the only downside is it reeks like a basement in an abandoned building but I’m sure after a quick wash that’ll clear right up haha, (remember never put material like this in the dryer, hang dry or it will shrink like crazy)

This skirt is exactly as pictured but even more beautiful! The fabric is soft and thick enough to not be see-through. Best of all, it fits! Usually waists are too tight and skirts are too long but this one is exactly right. I'm 5'2" so if you're tall you might not be as happy with it, though! But I'm thrilled! Color is vibrant and no chemical odor like many fabrics have.

评论概述: Daughter loves it but not the color we ordered
评论详情: I ordered the dusty olive for my daughter and we got a completely different color and patches that's not even one of the colors listed. Luckily she likes it anyway.
I wanted to love this SO bad but the quality is terrible. Not only did it come with a huge stain on it, but it’s literally falling about by the threads. I am returning this

评论概述: Bad quality, putrid smell, small waist, not what I was expecting.
评论详情: Okay so I bought the green one at first, it came with some flaws but had beautiful colours. So, I ordered another but in "beige" I was aware of the variation in colours and the size from already buying a green skirt, however, this beige skirt came absolutely poorly made. The waist is way smaller than the other skirt, its too tight although it has some stretch to it. The fabric itself is nice and lightweight & flowy, just like the other skirt. Heres the thing. The seams are literally busting, it has a PUTRID smell of chemicals that hasnt come out even after a couple washes, and the colour is not what I wanted at all. The seams have a ton of loose thread and if you pull them the whole patch will fall apart, the thread is also extremely easy to break and get caught on things when wearing. Like I said, I am aware of the variation in colours but I did not expect to recieve a FULLY RED skirt. I expected some red, majority brown, maybe some black, and I was even prepared for the possibility of blue in it too. The skirt I got is extremely disappointing and I do hope to get a refund for this purchase. Now onto size, I'm 5'4" and the skirt is a bit too long. I have to wear it up to my ribs and above my waist in order to not step on it. If I were to wear it on my waist, it would be way too tight and leave marks too. My hips are a size 32(usually in men's shorts) and my waist is just a few inches taken in from my hip size. I weigh 175 pounds for reference. For those who want to buy the beige colour, dont waste your money on a gamble. I had very little problems with the Olive Green colour so I suggest buying that one instead.
Colorful. Fits well. However  stitching  is not the best. Will require gentle care
I’m a 16/18 and this fits.  It’s too long but I’m only 5 ft.  I will try tying one side up.  Material feels nice.  Colors are lovely!
I ordered the all green "quilted" pattern one but got a multi color one delivered. I still like it though.
the elastic doesn’t stretch much, came with a lot of lose threads, mid comfortable. other than that it’s super cute! one of my favorite skirts but i wish it was a bit better

This is an absolutely beautiful skirt but.....I had to re-stitch every single panel in it. NONE of the stitching was ok. It was so bad, I wouldn't have even been able to hand wash it without it falling apart.
I love the length and the patchwork pattern. I get lots of compliments when I wear it.
Order as described
I love it! It looks handmade.

These are definitely handmade with many different color squares (I bought the blue, which has a blue yarn-like thread that goes around each square). I'm 5'8" and this skirt comes to about the top of my feet. I'm about 148 pounds (10 stone 8 pounds or 67.13 kg) and the medium fits great. I like that I can wear many colors with this skirt; it's a lovely boho type skirt.

I’m really sad because the skirt is really pretty but I’m a little on the chunkier side so there’s not enough fabric around the waste for it to be pretty and flowy (I’m 5’5 195lbs), so it looks a little funny. Seems to be decent quality though!

Thuu it s skirt exceed my expectations. I love it. Beautiful 🤩! I just ordered a beige one, please make sure it has some beige and coffee square print on it as I will be disapppinting if not. Because I am happy with my current skirt but you can see it has no beige or coffee color on it so I want to make sure beige one does has beige square on it
Absolutely beautiful. Very classy and the colors are even prettier in person. Will be back for more!
I ordered the green skirt thinking it would only be green but it came with other colors. It's pretty but not what I wanted aka not what the pic looked like.
I love this skirt and although it’s not exactly as pictured I would have given it a 5 star except a few really obvious threads look sloppy!

评论概述: REAL Patchwork - Beautiful but not Perfect - Plan to get Another One
评论详情: I got the "beige" and I LOVE IT! You need to keep an open mind with this one, but if you like unique and you appreciate the real patchwork design, you'll probably love it too.  This is not sheer at all but there is no lining. To be safe, I'll wear a slip, even though you could probably get away without one. The waist is elastic so that will stretch. The rest of it is not stretchy, but there is plenty of room. I could probably fit another person in my skirt. I'm 5'3 and weigh around 128 pounds. My hips are 40-1/2 inches, waist 30 inches.  Each skirt is a little different, so yours is not going to look exactly like the photos, but it will look "similar" with the "same color scheme." I think this is really cool!! The patchwork design is 100% real, not a ridiculous looking print.  All that being said, you need to accept some things. There is one size. Therefore, I took a photo to show the size of the waist on the one I received. The waist is elastic so it's going to stretch a lot, but it's still nice to have a guideline. I have a 30 inch waist and it fits very snug at the waist, not to the point where it's uncomfortable, but if my waist was just a little bit larger I think it could be a slightly painful. The hem is a little wonky. Actually, it's not even and it's actually unraveling in one spot, so I'm going to have to redo the hem myself so it hangs properly. The stitching on the patchwork looks like it may have been done with embroidery floss...it looks really neat to me, but it's sort of erratic.  There is no washing/care label on the skirt. Because of the somewhat loose looking stitches on the patchwork, I washed it on the delicate cycle in the machine, and it came out OK, but I will hand wash it moving forward to be safe. Now I'm gonna order another one :-)

I love this skirt. It is real patchwork and flows beautifully. Skirts in this style are usually one size and a bit on the long side. I am short and petite so I have to flip it over at the waist so it does not drag on floor, which is fine for me as I cover the top with my shirt.  It is a beautiful design, although mine has more red than brown.  I think mine is actually prettier than the picture, but be warned that these are unique items and the picture may not be exactly what you get.  I’m very happy with the purchase.
One is a me problem, another is more of an item problem. Me problem, it’s too long and I refuse to pay more for a tailor. Item problem, It came damaged with a lot of fraying on the strings.
Falls apart after a bit. Patchwork is real. Not just a print. Super cute. Alittle heavy. Overralls love this skirt
I love The feel of the material! I love the design.

I have had so many compliments on this beautiful skirt, the material is super soft and the way it flows and the patch work is just super beautiful, I know several ladies that has since purchased one to wear to church
Me quedó un poco apretada
It's a piece of crappy sewing.  DO NOT BUY THIS OR THEIR COMPANY IF THIS IS HOW THEY MAKE THEIR CLOTHES

I realize that there would be some variations in the fabrics but I really do not love the one I got- too much red. I wear a small or medium depending on how things are cut and this skirt was way too tight in the waist - it says in the description it goes up to 38 inches- well its right it does but it measures 25 inches and it hurts- I usually wear a size 6 skirt- I may have gotten a tighter one as these things are never consistent.  So with the other reviews I read, it should have fit me. The fabrics are much lighter than I expected. They are nice however.
The waist is to small to fit any human!
Way too small for fat Americans like me. But is beautiful

Very poorly constructed. The bottom hem was extremely uneven, and I had to cut it and make alterations. I was expecting more brown and tan colors and there was a lot of red and bright green. I would not buy again. Definitely not worth the price.

评论概述: COLOR OPTIONS LOOK NOTHING LIKE PICTURES
评论详情: This skirt pictured here was supposed to be the purple color option. It is completely pink, not even purple on it. I understand it is a patchwork skirt and can be randomized, but it's not even close to the picture. Why have color options if it's going to be a whole different, random skirt anyways? I wouldn't mind if it was even somewhat the same skirt in the picture, but it's not even close.  (EDIT-UPDATE): I ended up asking for a replacement on the blue color I ordered and it was actually like the listing color! I just have no idea why the blue option and purple option I first ordered came as completely pink/red skirts though. I'm not sure if those two orders were possibly a mistake. I recommend specifying to them how much of the color you want on the skirt.

I read the reviews and I was a bit skeptical but I am so glad I purchased this skirt it is gorgeous, I'm 5/2 and 135lbs the fit was perfect for me the length hit the floor but not under my feet it was just the perfect length for me absolutely no complaints I love it and the shipping was fast thank you, I will be wearing this tomorrow for a casual dinner out tomorrow

This dress is beautiful, and while I did forget to account the fact that the pattern will be absolutely randomized, I am astonished at what I got. However, the all of threads on the outside of the dress that are part of the design are loose, meaning they’re not tied in. It’s easy to get the threads snagged on and pulled out. And since I’m short (usually a size 8P), I have to fold the waistband a couple of times, but that’s not an issue at all. All in all, you buy this, you have to be careful about not getting snagged, or you’ll have to put the thick thread under each loop (which I had to do by hand).

评论概述: Beautiful fabric, waistband 2 sizes smaller than I ordered
评论详情: Beautiful, problem is that I ordered a larger size for comfort and the waistband is 2 sizes too small. I am not a European model, I’m a regular older American. Usually I wear a size 10 but I ordered a 14 and it’s toooooooo tight. Why buy premade clothes if you have to remake them once you get them. The seams are sewn thru the waistband so I can’t just add a drawstring, I have to take it apart and do manual alterations. I don’t want to do that. This is why I buy manufactured clothing, I Don’t want to make my own clothes. I’m really pissed because I ordered this for an event then couldn’t wear it. Really???? I’m a 10. Not extremely obese. I ordered this extra large for me and it’s to small. As beautiful as your clothing is I doubt I will ever place another order with you.

I have purchased several patchwork skirts lately looking for the perfect one and this is by far the most beautiful.  It is far more beautiful than even the photos on the listing. It is handmade as well. Which brings the one word of caution.  Some of the stitching is extremely delicate. I will likely have to actually hand wash it and may reinforce the seams myself. Even with that, it is still worth 5 stars for the beauty and feel of it.
